HOME.ONE_TIME_SECRET_MESSAGING_SUBTITLE: Yabelana ngem秘密, bese kuba khona!
HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Ukuvikelwa, kuqinisekisiwe futhi kuvikelwe yi-Stellar Security
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: Siqinisekisa ukuvikelwa okuqinile kolwazi lwakho olubucayi. Wonke amanye data ayagcinwa ku-client-side. Asikwazi ukwazi ikheli lakho le-IP, okukhona, noma obani owasabelana ngamagama am秘密 - futhi okubaluleke kakhulu, okuqukethwe.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: Uke kuphela owazi i-URL yolwazi lwezinto ozidalile nokuqinisekisa noma obani ofuna ukubasabela. Uma udala im秘密, ungangeza iphasiwedi ngaphambi kokuthi ikhululwe. Futhi kungenzeka ukusetha isikhathi sokushisa. Noma yini, im秘密 izosuswa emva kwezinsuku ezingu-14.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: Zonke izixhumanisi nokuhlangenwe nakho kuhashwa ku-client-side, okusho ukuthi futhi asikwazi ukwazi i-URL nokuhlangenwe nakho. I-URL ngayinye inenombolo eyingqayizivele yesikhathi esingu-36 engokuhlolwa kwendlela yokufinyelela Imiyalezo Yensimu kanye nokuqukethwe okukhishwa nge-AES-256.
HOME.STEP_1_TITLE: Bhala umlayezo wakho kanye/noma wakhe iphasiwedi
HOME.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: Ukuvikelwa, kuqinisekisiwe futhi kuvikelwe yi-Stellar Security
HOME.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Bhala umyalezo wakho we-Secret, iphasiwedi noma ulwazi olubucayi *

VIEW.INSTRUCTION: Bhala bese uthumela umyalezo, kuzoba kususwa uma kufundwa.
VIEW.DOWNLOAD_MESSAGE: Landa i-Stellar Secret kumakhalekhukhwini, dala imiyalezo yakho ye-secret
